item.title: Hunter's Moon Kickstarter
item.description: The legendary C64 software house Thalamus is back! Created in 1986 by mag publisher Newsfield, it quickly grew a reputation for quality titles. The connection with Zzap!64 probably didn’t hurt either. News broke a couple of months ago that the label was being reborn as Thalamus Digital, and that we could look forward to some of those classic games making a come back - including the possibility of a new installment of Creatures.

item.title: Broken Age Part 1
item.description: The Double Fine Adventure Kickstarter was one of those few moments where you feel like you’re actually seeing a seismic shift in the industry. I jumped in within hours of the campaign going live - as a huge fan of adventure games, particularly those from Lucasfilm/Lucas Arts, I didn’t need to think twice. It’s been a really fascinating ride since then - the behind the scenes videos are the best accounts of game development ever committed to film, and I almost don’t want them to finish the game as that will mean the end of them.
